get.description: One of email or tenant_name must be provided, You can send 2 query params at the same time,it  will check email first.

400.description: If neither of email and tenant_name are provided.

404.description: When tos sent does not exist in database.

schema.description: If 409 code is "EXPIRED_VERIFICATION_CODE", server automatically sends a new one to user's email before returning response.

503.description: The Health Check is not successful

agreedAt.description: If not provided, is generated automatically.

headers.description: Set headers values through strings. Provide `null` to remove a header.

value.description: You can try your cron expressions here: https://crontab.guru
Valid ISO 8601 date string, you can create your dates with this tool: https://www.timestamp-converter.com
